title: On the radio
author: VD
content_html:
My publisher informs me that I’ll be a guest on G. Gordon Liddy’s show on Radio America today around noon EST. I don’t know if we’re talking about TIA, homeschooling or Title IX, but feel free to tune in if you happen to get it in your area.

Here is the MP3 from today’s show.
